create-new-wallet: Forge a new Dynex Chest o’ Booty
create-where-tostore: Choose where yer chest shall be stowed
create-set-password: Set a secret key fer openin’ this chest
open-wallet: Unlock yer Dynex Chest o’ Booty
import-keys-import: Smuggle private keys t’ restore a chest
import-keys-location: Choose where yer chest be stowed
import-keys-password: Set a secret key fer openin’ this chest
import-keys-importinfo: Smuggle private keys ‘n restore yer chest
import-seed-import: Smuggle Mnemonic Treasure Map ‘n restore yer chest
import-seed-location: Choose where yer chest be stowed
import-seed-password: Set a secret key fer openin’ this chest
import-seed-button: Smuggle treasure map ‘n restore yer chest
send-amount-info: Enter th’ loot ye wish t’ send
send-to-info: Search yer Book o’ Mates or enter a new map
transactions-datanotavailable: Transaction details not yet written in th’ ledger
transactions-notsynced: Ye’ve no plunder yet or yer chest be syncin’
bridge-chain-info: Choose yer ocean t’ sail t’
bridge-walletid-info: Supply an address t’ where yer wrapped Dynex loot be sent
bridge-amount-info: Amount o’ DNX ye wish t’ send fer wrapping
backup-safety-msg: Backing up yer key be a vital step t’ keepin’ yer Dynex safe. The secret keys below be able t’ restore yer chest usin’ the Dynex Electron Wallet. This key be highly valuable ‘n sensitive. NEVER SHARE this key with another soul! If ye lose this key or it falls in th’ wrong hands, yer loot could be plundered! Keep it safe by printing two scrolls ‘n hiding ‘em in two different secret havens. Lose these keys ‘n delete yer chest file, ‘n yer booty be lost forever!
backup-safety-msg2: This key be essential t’ protectin’ yer chest o’ treasures ‘n funds from bein’ lost t’ th’ depths.
backup-safety-msg3: Do not store it on any gadget! Ye alone be responsible fer keepin’ it secure.
backup-your-viewkey-info: This key be free o’ spaces
backup-your-spendkey-info: This key be free o’ spaces
backup-your-seed-info: Th’ mnemonic seed always holds 25 words
backup-safety-msg4: Keep yer keys hidden ‘n secret! Anyone with ‘em can claim yer chest!
settings-service-path: Set the Path t’ DNX-Service Executable
settings-node-path: Set the Path t’ DNX-Node Executable
settings-dhip-eth-info: This lets ye monitor yer 0xDNX DHIP Loot Participation
settings-qnode-subgrp-info: This lets ye keep an eye on yer Quantum Nodes
settings-language-info: Choose th’ language o’ yer crew
about-title: This software be a GUI front-end fer managing Dynex (DNX). Ye can use it t’ create new chests, import old ones, or open existing Dynex Electron Chests. Manage yer plunder, view yer treasure count, log o’ transactions, ‘n send DNX. Ye can find source codes, release notes, ‘n bug trackers on our Github page
about-license-p2: Ye be free t’ use, copy, or modify this software fer any purpose, with or without fee, as long as this notice remains
about-license-p3: THIS SOFTWARE BE AS IS! THE CREATORS DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EVEN IMPLIED ONES. THEY BE NOT LIABLE FER DAMAGES CAUSED BY USIN’ THIS SOFTWARE, WHETHER DIRECT, INDIRECT, OR CONSEQUENTIAL.
